sql.name: 根据处理器ID获取探测器列表
sql.content: SELECT id, detector_id, processor_id, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, start_point, end_point FROM t_detector WHERE processor_id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 根据ID获取探测器
sql.content: SELECT id, detector_id, processor_id, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, start_point, end_point, pos_desc FROM t_detector WHERE id = ':id'

sql.name: 添加探测器
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_detector (id, detector_id, processor_id, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, start_point, end_point) VALUES (':id', ':detectorId', ':processorId', ':nfcNumber', :longitude, :latitude, :startPoint, :endPoint )

sql.name: 修改探测器
sql.content: UPDATE t_detector SET detector_id=':detectorId', nfc_number=':nfcNumber', longitude=:longitude, latitude=:latitude, start_point=:startPoint, end_point=:endPoint WHERE id = ':id'
